snippet.title: The Invincible | Date Reveal
snippet.description:
Your mission starts on November 6, 2023. Wishlist The Invincible and prepare yourself for what's to come, Astroscientist:

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/731040/The_Invincible/
Epic Games Store - https://store.epicgames.com/pl/p/the-invincible
GOG.com - https://www.gog.com/game/the_invincible
Xbox Store - https://www.xbox.com/pl-pl/games/store/the-invincible/9n19rm08ql3k
PS Store - https://store.playstation.com/pl-pl/concept/10002666

Prepare yourself for the upcoming mission on Regis III. A mere moment ago, you and your crew were engaged in a lively discussion about scientific phenomena. Now, in an inexplicable turn of events, you find yourself isolated, surrounded by the unsettling, uncharted surface of Regis III, in search for your lost crew.
Your task is clear: harness every atom-powered device at your disposal and summon every molecule of your unwavering determination. Find your missing crew and bring them back on deck. It's an unwritten rule of our species: no human shall be left behind, whether dead or alive.

#theinvincible #releasedate #gamerelease2023 #scifigame #adventuregame
